title: Outlier Detection Using Scikit-Learn Algorithms
description: This lab demonstrates how to use Scikit-Learn to perform outlier detection on classical anomaly detection datasets using the local outlier factor (LOF) and isolation forest (IForest) algorithms. The performance of the algorithms is assessed in an outlier detection context, and ROC curves are used to plot the results.

meta.title: Outlier Detection Using Scikit-Learn Algorithms
meta.description: Explore how to use Scikit-Learn for outlier detection on real-world datasets with LOF and IForest algorithms.
meta.keywords: machine learning, anomaly detection, isolation forest, scikit learn, machine learning playground, scikit-learn, local outlier factor, outlier detection, scikit-learn playground
